description:
Digital protected area polygon data was created using the legal descritpions of the boundaries as published on the Government Gazette Statutory Instruments (legal decrees).

Coastal Reserves 2014: Produced in 2014 by Land Information Centre/CZMAI with a preferential scale of 1:100,000.  With a national coverage in polygon format
name: TM_BELIZE_Coastal protected areas_100.000_2014
